title: Why Computers are Straight up Magic
summary: I see no functional difference between computer technology today and the magic of ancient sorcerers. Seriously.
author: Gabe Koss

title: Ode to C
summary: A humorous poem devoted to the love of a language.
author: Unknown

title: Running Rspec from Vim
summary: When working on Rspec tests for Ruby code it can be helpful to run your tests with finite control
author: Gabe Koss

title: My Open Source Report Card
summary: A cool site which creates an dopen source report card based on your public github activty.
author: Gabe Koss

title: textfiles.com
summary: I am a lover of ASCII art and text files in general. I love vim and writing in markdown and plaintext. You can bet I was excited when I stumbled across textfiles.com.
author: Gabe Koss
